Note that any Jackpots are shown and paid in your account currency.

Big Bad Wolf
About the game Big Bad Wolf is a 5 reel, 25 bet line video slot. The game features Swooping Reels functionality, Pigs Turn Wild feature and Free Spins with the Blowing Down the House feature. Theoretical payout is 97.34%
How to play Video slots are very easy to play. Just follow these 3 steps:
1. Choose your total bet 2. Press the SPIN symbol button 3. Check for any win in the WIN field
For more understanding of Settings, Game Rules, and Game Features read the text below.
Description of game functionality
Bet The Total bet is shown in the TOTAL BET display. Change the bet by clicking on the display and choosing the total bet of your choice. The Total Bet is based on the bet per line multiplied with the number of bet lines active. The number of bet lines used in the game can be changed by clicking on the BET LINES display.
Spin The game is started by pressing the SPIN symbol button. You can Quick Stop the game by pressing the SPIN symbol button again.
Win Any total win in a game round will be displayed in the WIN field. All wins are multiplied by the bet per line. Bet line wins pay in succession from leftmost to right. Only the highest win per active bet line is paid. The separate bet line wins will be displayed on the bet lines during win presentation. In Free Spins only the total win is displayed for each spin.
Paytable All winning combinations in the game can be viewed in the PAYTABLE.
Fast Play The FAST PLAY functionality is used to get the shortest game round possible. The duration of game rounds may vary depending on bandwidth and server response time.
Autoplay Autoplay allows you to play a number of game rounds automatically. Press AUTOPLAY and choose a number of game rounds to initiate Autoplay. The remaining number of spins is displayed to the right of the STOP button. Autoplay is stopped by pressing the STOP button.
Settings In the settings panel at the bottom left of the game you can choose: - Use SPACE for spin Use SPACE for spin allows you to use your Space Bar on your keyboard to initiate game rounds.
- Show Splash Screen on startup This setting allows you to switch the games Splash Screen on and off.
Special symbols
Wild Symbols The Wild Symbols substitute for all symbols except the Free Spin Scatter symbol, and the Multiplier Wild symbol.
The game has two different types of Wild Symbols: Regular Wild Pigs Turn Wild symbols, see Pigs Turn Wild feature description
Scatter Symbol Scatter symbols are not bound to bet lines. Three or more Scatter symbols initiate the Free Spins feature. Three or more Scatter symbols pay bet X3
Moon Symbol The moon symbol appear in free spins. The moon symbol trigger the Blowing down the House progress. The symbol only appears on the last reel.
Game Features
Swooping Reels All winning combinations trigger the Swooping Reels feature. 1. Any winning symbols in a game round will disappear. 2. The empty spaces will be filled with symbols falling down from above. 3. Any new wins will be added to the existing win. 4. The feature will end when there are no new winning combinations.
Pigs Turn Wild One of the Pig symbols turn wild every second win during the Swooping Reels feature. 2nd win - Pig 1 turns wild 4th win - Pig 2 turns wild 6th win - Pig 3 turns wild The Pigs stay as wild symbols until there are no new winning combinations.
Free Spins 3+ Scatter symbols will initiate 10 Free Spins. 3+ Scatter symbols in Free Spins awards 10 additional free spins The Free Spins feature will play until there are no Free Spins left.
Additional Free Spins can be rewarded in the Blowing down the House feature.
Bears Turn Wild feature Collect Moon symbols to make progress in the Blowing down the House feature. 3 Moon symbols makes the wolf blow down the wood house, and awards 2 additional spin. 6 moon symbols blows down the brick house, awards 2 additional spins, and an X2 multiplier on all following spins.
Malfunction in the game voids all pays.

You have won the %1 Jackpot! Due to technical problems we are currently unable to add the jackpot to your bankroll automatically. To receive your prize, please contact customer support.
We have not been able to place your bet. Please check your updated balance.
This game is not currently available.
Please log into your account. If you were previously logged in, your session may have expired.
The server is currently undergoing maintenance. Your game should resume automatically in a couple of minutes.

All winning combinations trigger the SWOOPING REELS FEATURE
1. Any winning symbols in a game round will disappear
2. The empty spaces will be filled by symbols falling down from above
3. Any new wins will be added to the existing win
4. The feature will end when there are no new winning combinations

All winning rounds count. Every second win will turn a pig into a wild symbol.
2nd win - Pig 1 turns wild 4th win - Pig 2 turns wild 6th win - Pig 3 turns wild.
Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except Multiplier Wild symbol, Free Spin scatter symbol and Free Spin progress scatter symbol.

3+ Free Spins Scatter symbols activate 10 free spins 3+ Scatters in Free Spins awards 10 additional Free Spins Additional Free Spins can also be awarded in the Blowing Down the House feature
3+ Scatter symbols pays bet x 3

Collect the moon symbols to help the wolf blow down the houses.
3 Moon symbols blows down the wood house, and awards 2 additional spins
6 Moon symbols cause the wolf to blow down the brick house, awards 2 additional spins, and an X2 multiplier on following wins.
WINS MULTIPLIED BY BET PER LINE. Only the highest win per active betline is paid. Bet line wins pay if in succession from leftmost to right. Malfunction voids all pays.
WOW! You have reached the maximum number of 1000 Swoops. Your game round has ended.
Scatter wins are added to payline wins
